thread.title: Nathon Rutherford
thread.title_full: Thinking Capital reviewed by Nathon Rutherford

author: Nathon Rutherford
title: Nathon Rutherford
text:
Being from the opposite end of the country I was skeptical as to wether or not this process would even be possible. However to my surprise within a week I had forwarded all of my pertinent information to Thinking Capitol and after 3 or 4 phone convos and my online banking info I was approved and the funds hit my account 24 hrs later.
The payments are small enough that repaying at a daily rate is manageable.
Thanks Thinking Capital
